title: VCP Project Configuration
description: Configuration file for Vibe Coding Protocol. Declares which standards, scopes, and compliance frameworks apply to this project. Created by /init, read by all VCP skills.

$schema.description: JSON Schema URL for editor validation.

scopes.description: Which VCP scopes apply to this project. Core is always active (implicit).

web-frontend.description: Client-side web development (React, Vue, Svelte, Angular, HTML/CSS/JS).

web-backend.description: Server-side web development (Express, FastAPI, Django, Spring Boot, Rails).

compliance.description: Active compliance frameworks. Empty array if none.

frameworks.description: Specific frameworks and tools in use. Helps skills give framework-specific advice.

exclude.description: Glob patterns for paths to skip during scanning. node_modules/** and .git/** are always excluded.

severity.description: Minimum severity to report. Default: medium (report medium and above).
